title: 2013-14 patch (v0.5) for FIFA 11
description:
2013-14 patch (v0.5) for FIFA 11


features:
New:
- Tool "FIFA 11 Selector": change options of the patch the way you like
- Squads: 
* Official EA squad-update from FIFA 14 (date: 2.11.2013)
* 3 new Leagues (ea license): Chile's Campeonato Nacional Petrobras,
Colombia's Liga PostobÃƒÂ³n, Argentine Primera DivisiÃƒÂ³n
* rest of world (ea license): shakhtar donetsk
* Offline & Online version
* career & tournement: new leagues (colombia, chile, argentina)
* career & tournement: new Cups (Copa Libertadores, Saudi Crown Prince Cup)
- all new kits
- updated numbers
- updated name fonts
- 5 new stadiums: arena stadiums made playable
- 47 new balls (league balls, ...)
- 700 new shoes
- main generic-adboard changed
- new mini-faces
- updated & licensed logos: 200+ new teams logos & leagues 
- all faces avaible online & offline (=online compatible)
- xtra goalnet-coulours (improvements)
- correct goalkeeper kit in arena-mode
- New Intro
- licensed names: for teams, leagues, trophies,... (ENGLISH ONLY, others will be released later)


Also included...

from 2012-13 patch:
- new trophy logo & pictures: real-life pictures
- new banner & flags
- new english commentary (enable with Selector-tool)
- new gameplay (enable with Selector-tool)
- 3 new stadiums: 
* Etihad Stadium (mancity)
* BC Place Stadium (Vancouver Whitecaps)
* Sheldon Stadium (generic stadium)
- faces: FIFA online 3 models (= FIFA 13) (mixed with FIFA 13 mods)
- New sideline people: medics, photographers, cameraman, ballboy, police, steward, generic peoples
- goalkeeper gloves
- New winter-gloves: black nike
- improved menus: realife player-pictures
- realistic sponsers for career

from add-ons:
- New music included (enable with Selector-tool)


- garanteed compatibility with online mode: no missing textures, ... for other players



Installation:
1. install fifa 11 
2. install ea patch (1.01)
3. install 2013-14 patch (v0.5)
3. Start FIFA 11
4. Create new profile (old squads-savegame dont work anymore)
5. ENJOY!


Notes:
- your old savegames dont work with the new squads
- Some new players that are being added may have small problems with their name when you play online
- use the included tool "FIFA 11 Selector" (at folder ...FIFA 11) for:
* switching squads: ALL KITS & NUMBERS only avaible at offline version
* enabling: gameplay, music, commentary, ...
* fixing fifa 11: use "i68 Regenerator" if you got problems (crashes, missing files, ...) with FIFA 11
- includes all files from 2012-13 patch
- More languages to come later


Problems:
- crashes, ...: use the "i68 regenerator" (select "take care of edited files..." > go , can take some time) 



pls leave your comments if there are any problems
